project.title: Painting With Gossip
project.excerpt: Painting with Gossip is a website that allows users to draw with the latest headlines from Danish tabloid newspaper EkstraBladet.
project.content:
Painting with Gossip is a website that allows users to draw with the latest headlines from Danish tabloid newspaper EkstraBladet. What else to say?
